cloud.jgo.jjdom.dom.nodes.html

Interface HTMLDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Document, Home, Manipulable, Node, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTMLDefaultDocument

    public interface HTMLDocument
extends Document, Home
    Author:
    Martire91
    This interface represents an html document
